document.title: Georgia Standards of Excellence CTEA Business, Management and Administration

0DD797F9EABB4C98B629AA13EFFE31AF.description: Explore the competitive events related to the content of this course and the required competencies, skills, and knowledge for each related event for individual, team, and chapter competitions.

26235D36BA4F40F7A82A26B85024C2DA.description: Explain how participation in career and technology education student organizations can promote lifelong responsibility for community service and professional development.

CF584196F38140608FD69CEEDF83A94F.description: Explore the local, state, and national opportunities available to students through participation in related student organizations -FBLA, DECA- including but not limited to conferences, competitions, community service, philanthropy, and other student organization activities.

5BABE748706F4AD894DDD8E6F078B19A.description: Explore the impact and opportunities a student organization -FBLA, DECA- can develop to bring business and education together in a positive working relationship through innovative leadership and career development programs.

7B4D08B1E7B64A41A5C78149926E8F41.description: Explain the goals, mission, and objectives of Future Business Leaders of America -FBLA- and/or DECA.

B01D790AE7964F77A09A1833D47E8C26.description: Explore how related student organizations are integral parts of career and technology education courses through leadership development, school and community service projects, entrepreneurship development, and competitive events.

D5A2F5CE78524D7FA20CE825FC0BC82E.description: Complete the Revenue Streams component of the Business Model Canvas. Upload to online career portfolio.

8E70B70E07CF4B638DCA16E57146082D.description: Demonstrate an understanding of basic financial skills including time value of money, compound interest, payment estimation, financial calculator skills, budgeting, return on investment, depreciation, and an amortization schedule.

61D28F9A28A6440DAB4F9A24BE913673.description: Explain bootstrapping and give reasons why it is, or is not, a viable option for a chosen value proposition.

99767C8B81B84C62A83233FC896B787D.description: Examine the advantages and disadvantages of debt versus equity financing.

C7F97FB441A04DD09B4A812261F2D142.description: Identify and calculate projected operational expenses for a given time period (month, quarter, year).

4C8977D8193E4AD09BF18DF686F07ABB.description: Calculate the cost of resources needed to produce and sell a product or service.

7A804FDD587D4CDC8F7F47D755C26265.description: Explore various sources for loans, such as financial institutions, relatives, and others, and calculate the costs over time using current interest rates.

6854809298044802AF193B107793AB43.description: Identify potential sources for revenue streams for start-up and ongoing operations, such as loans, grants, angel investors, crowdfunding, sales, and others.

063E6BA30C21464290EAA42D61A45283.description: Explain the role of seed money for an entrepreneurial venture.

4C038575A3064988BD47B8ABB113FAB0.description: Identify methods for raising capital and evaluate various sources of revenue for an entrepreneurial venture.

4EBE75907A4D45A4B36C344D3D9C909D.description: Complete the Customer Relationship component of the Business Model Canvas by listing strategies to build customer loyalty. Upload to online career portfolio.

092EF858F0EF49C6A54FBB59A11CDFD4.description: Design a customer service policy that ensures customer satisfaction through consistent messaging, complaint/conflict resolution, retention of current customers, gathering feedback, and handling negative social media posts and comments.

629D8249A65645B58DAAFB0515144D58.description: Determine the functions and benefits of a customer relationship management (CRM) system.

843A986C7DBB465EB107EA7C4E624E81.description: Utilize networking and business leads to expand the customer base.

CFAAE8E8E102420DBEE6E40FE1C0AEE2.description: Explain the role of various loyalty and incentive programs in retaining current customers and recruiting new ones.

60A0255AE42A46C4AE0BAB4A1BE4D2BB.description: Investigate various customer services policies and their impact on acquiring and retaining customers.

0DAA326DE15E4D6C8A34F69A5B0CE07A.description: Identify and compare different types of customer relationships.

1571DF9818414EFDA3347FED42EBFFD8.description: Examine the importance of customer relationships and determine the impacts on the success of a business venture.

72B5584FB2E541508483B2D2C0C3B158.description: Complete the Channels component of the Business Model Canvas. Upload to online career portfolio.

95A1B8714A1B46F69BF7A974277BC283.description: Calculate the costs of channels of distribution and customer communications.

6E47AD700E85484283B2FD41A7E6B9FD.description: Analyze emerging technologies and determine their impact on the chosen value proposition.

B0403900791D43E7BC3970A757376BAA.description: Utilize the 4 Ps of the marketing mix (product, place, price, promotion) to draft a marketing plan for the chosen value proposition.

760D07FB2BB14B5CB7B97F7F931EB7AC.description: Define markets and the concept of market share.

50A5BC3A13BC45D289DE445879A3EE18.description: Compare the advantages and disadvantages of a real store front versus a virtual store front.

5E15DADF7C52442BAA75A0C48D625494.description: Explain the importance of location for a business.

7885D82C312C4F82B33CF3E9B61C92B0.description: Determine whether a direct or indirect channel of distribution is best for the chosen value proposition and identify each step in the channel of distribution.

9667A21AD7FF4FBDA4464259B9180536.description: Explain the difference in channels of communication and channels of distribution.

69EA334D8AF945CCB5EDC6CADB31FDC2.description: Evaluate different strategies for reaching customers, consider B2C, B2B and a hybrid model.

94E346969EF643CC8D1B7DE17C238EE6.description: Explore the various channels available, virtual and physical, to reach customers and identify the channels most appropriate to reach potential customers for the chosen value proposition.

9200BA2B481442A9987CFEDB7B14F5E8.description: Complete the Customer Segments component of the Business Model Canvas (BMC). Upload to online career portfolio.

00AD59EF3ADF468BBB4350F7F0D96BE1.description: Explain the mass market and niche market concepts.

D661A04DB46645B681D0C3DF99814644.description: Prioritize customer segments to determine initial target market and future growth markets.

9B72FFD317D94AD188262F1D13AADD9E.description: Develop a customer profile describing potential customers, including demographic, socioeconomic, and geographic attributes.

7A76779191EB401387D35223AA922F95.description: Research potential customers for a value proposition; consider their income, spending habits, motivations, etc.

180303602F4B46E09EB3D0B4EB4E81B0.description: Compare market research to customer discovery and discuss the value of both.

558B94DF547D4BE1BE90BEF273E1C438.description: Examine the process of customer discovery as it applies to the lean start-up method.

E7985E5E979746028B00237327FAD5B5.description: Utilize customer discovery to understand who customers are and determine the potential market for a product or service.

C08A450DBF62410DB5DCF644054D8A7A.description: Choose an entrepreneurial venture and complete the Value Proposition component of the Business Model Canvas. Upload to online career portfolio.

682454E4B6614FD399DD1E2508068DDA.description: Build a basic prototype for a product or service and use customer feedback to make changes.

C0725BEFCADE4D3F82EF74CB92C272EE.description: Conduct the lean start-up method to develop a minimum viable product.

2DEAEA57F13B4294BD6551B5FE598AB1.description: Compare relationship of Value Propositions to Cost Center (Key Partners, Key Activities, Key Resources, and Cost Structure)

39832316340D40868C69A575AF63EA9D.description: Compare relationship of Value Propositions to Profit Center (Identify Customers, Channels, Customer Relationships, and Revenue Streams)

D1B712CA5CED4C1785A38F4FFE9DE255.description: Describe the value proposition for a product or service solution.

E8689F32936241CC9B4B0F66A0625F7B.description: Research methods to test a MVP, select appropriate methods for given product, conduct test(s), and analyze results.

4AD07F936094452E8D70DD1576F84B4D.description: Utilize design thinking principles to decide which value proposition to use in a start-up business.

FE2F69BEB9784F8C971A5304CA53590E.description: Compare a prototype to minimum viable product (MVP), determine the purpose of each, and explain when and how to use each one during product development.

1552DE35FC19433E8E4AE781E04E0568.description: Examine the benefits of using lean start-up methodology when developing a new product.

70A234AC14784655934E6C59C32F6B21.description: Implement the lean start-up methodology; identify a problem, develop a minimum viable product (MVP), test a MVP, and determine a value proposition.

858BC2B744924B4FBAEC73B389B5DBF7.description: Create a draft Business Model Canvas for a new start-up business. Upload to online career portfolio.

FF91BAB5071D46FFB22877EDC4C8B343.description: Describe the Business Model Canvas (BMC) and its components: Value Propositions, Customer Segments, Channels, Customer Relationships, Revenue Streams, Key Partners, Key Activities, Key Resources, and Cost Structures.

D031750C9F844C33944F329DB6ABBE0D.description: Compare and contrast various business models with business plans.

E3191C0C33CC4BF991EA2463A891973D.description: Evaluate the effectiveness of a business model for a specific business.

CE8D3B1FAD4D4DB5B0463231E001B647.description: Compare a traditional business plan to a lean startup model.

F39C876DBC29411F9F4CC4AE21E8D4E5.description: Identify and describe the elements of the lean startup methodology.

DF8A391DA7B3492B9D7192A2EFD8853B.description: Explain the components of a traditional business plan.

F005E68FC47041929BD8CF162674936B.description: Examine traditional methods for starting a new business and describe the lean start-up methodology.

796F76B94CDB4D46ACF9D729C82F3EBA.description: Identify strategies to minimize risks involved with a start-up entrepreneurial venture.

9C46BD2051E34C148CFEA7A215E5A477.description: Research and identify reasons why many start-ups fail.

FFB4A44DCE8449629BA2371EEC20BFFF.description: Discuss the ethical dilemma between what is profitable and what is socially responsible.

3E882A73F7044F0FB5E7F1CFF5471168.description: Define social entrepreneurship and identify potential solutions for social and environmental concerns.

1B1639E41A6E49A1B838F604999EDC9C.description: Discover opportunity gaps for existing products or services.

DF80E996B0C9459E8F4A3C3F5AB0617F.description: Refine an existing product or service.

7B6CA3833C944C8485826FB4A6B60504.description: Create a solution to a problem.

985F72BAE3D64D6D93659C85FEF4192D.description: Brainstorm a new product or service.

852785E277F54064AFA93E6F5B62FAC5.description: Recognize entrepreneurial opportunities through a variety of ways.

F10A39F2DAB54818B60B35CA99AF1047.description: Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of the different types of business (sole proprietorship, corporation, limited liability company, etc.)

23F7DB0EC80D45468F5C09A3BD2CE649.description: Examine the various categories of businesses, such as service, manufacturing, retail, wholesale, and analyze their role in the economy.

AC8A922B2133456BAC526B0296FA7FFC.description: Explore various strategies and identify different paths to starting a business.

FA7961B0C8CC434EB8FEF39E96A2C56F.description: Compose a personal vision statement. Upload to online career portfolio.

7D695C45BF0A44B682B445B5E6DCC3C0.description: Analyze benefits/rewards/advantages and risks/disadvantages of being an entrepreneur.

B7721C2C7C984BC68F6F438E59D43D64.description: Analyze entrepreneur versus intrapreneur versus employee. Differentiate the unique traits and behaviors of each and determine their roles in the economy.

582ECC82EE81481FA97FB17EE9046999.description: Utilize one or more personality assessments (e.g., Myers-Briggs, High5, DiSC, and others) to determine entrepreneurial strengths. Upload to online career portfolio.

33682EC333654368843D4BC343B84A5F.description: Incorporate the 5 Voices Communication assessment or Energetics assessment to provide students an in-depth analysis of individual communication style and personality traits and behaviors. Upload to online career portfolio.

C5207CF224AA4F6488DD102C5F06E499.description: Utilize one or more aptitude and interest assessments, such as YouScience, to discover strengths, weaknesses, and entrepreneurial traits. Upload to online career portfolio.

0B3B21CBC8A74CF3807D99DD507526A6.description: Identify characteristics of a successful entrepreneur.

24D8EFF3BBF343C5BA3F31428FDF1097.description: Distinguish characteristics of entrepreneurs and determine personal attributes that can contribute to both success and failure of an entrepreneurial venture.

76E646E25BAB4FCB9981D64EB4CA0A55.description: Organize the portfolio in a manner that makes documents and artifacts easy to locate and access for review.

28C56804991B4B8E9CCCD0EA960A3264.description: Identify and upload industry-appropriate artifacts reflective of mastered skills throughout this course. Write and include a reflective entry for each artifact discussing steps taken, problems encountered and how they were overcome, and other pertinent information about the learning.

5CF377EE40DD4AAF99382D632C7C2EB0.description: Upload additional standard job search items, such as digital badges and certificates earned for industry-recognized credentials.

53B5726FF6A74B479CA5133BB324B73A.description: Upload a professional, true, and accurate résumé and cover letter seeking employment for a position representative of current skills and knowledge.

6FD254CB63A446059054E50E3D0E5797.description: Establish an account for long-term use to upload professional artifacts over the course of the career pathway.

26CF42139B79475CA34C611F77A9CADB.description: Compare a variety of secure online repositories and select the best one for specific career goals, such as Github for education, Dropbox, Jimdo, Uxfol.io, Portfoliobox and many others.

8373B88CADB246EB8601F113E50AAAD2.description: Establish a personal online career portfolio and begin uploading relevant artifacts.
